transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hello? Hello. Yeah, I'm expecting sal here. Salon prince.
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: From. Am the student.
Speaker B: Sorry, Yes, I'm. Yes, I'm looking for.
Speaker A: I'll do one thing. I'm not able to hear you very properly. I will be texting you and WhatsApp message. Do respond me over there and then I can talk ahead about your accommodation part. Okay?
Speaker B: Yes. Okay. This. This is my, my WhatsApp number. Also.
Speaker A: I have dropped you a text. Okay. Sorry, I have dropped you WhatsApp text.
Speaker B: I didn't get. I'm. I'm not getting you very much. Please.
Speaker A: I have. I have actually messaged you on WhatsApp. Just turn your net on you it in my message will be able to go. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay.

Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hello, am I speaking as Alan here? Charles Allen? Yeah, Charles, Just wanted to confirm if you have decided anything with the student accommodation of yours.
Speaker B: Oh, sorry, I didn't tell you. I have. I've canceled my. My book. So I'm very sorry. I found another accommodation.
Speaker A: Which property that you have booked?
Speaker B: Sorry, which.
Speaker A: Property do you have booked?
Speaker B: I found another property in Good enough college. Good Enough college in central London. So it's close to ucl, so it is not me. I've decided. So my supervisor that decided to book our homes there.
Speaker A: Okay, thank you for the confirmation.
